entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Significant Performance Disparity Between Arm64 and x64 Write Barriers #106051
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8JsonReader should read from JsonNode #106047
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Anlyzer for wrong usage of interpolated string with Logger methods #106041
    Future
  • [wasm] Can no longer build on main using stable debian #106036
  • assert(firstILBlock->hasProfileWeight()); #106033
    10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] How to compile linux-musl-arm64 shared libraries on Ubuntu( x64) #106029
  • [browser] Unsupported long branch opcode #106028
    9.0.0
  • Android API 23, Runtime Crash in .NET 9 #106025
    9.0.0
  • Trust self-signed certificates when using PrincipalContext and DirectoryEntry #106024
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: TypeName.MakeSimpleTypeName(AssemblyNameInfo) to avoid type name reparsing #106022
    9.0.0
  • failure in TestStackOverflow.Program.TestStackOverflow3 #106021
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(imm < maxVal) || ((imm & signBitsMask) == signBitsMask)' during 'Generate code' #106020
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Regressions in System.Collections on 8/2/2024 1:16:56 PM #106027
    9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Assertion at mono/utils/lock-free-alloc.c:210, condition `!desc->in_use' not met #106007
  • Error loading rules.ninja when building coreclr tests locally #106005
  • Test failure:System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.MultipleReadsAndWrites #106002

Closed

  • ColorTranslator.ToWin32 is inefficient #105992
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.Tests.PEBuilderTests.NativeResources #102979
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: LdapSessionOptions.CaCertificates Property #104260
  • Containerize the test execution #2600
    Future
  • Libraries work to support Cloud Native effort for .NET 9 #97522
    9.0.0
  • compilation gives error SYSLIB1094 for a GeneratedComInterface interface deriving from an interface in another project #102602
    9.0.0
  • DI behavior change between .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0 #102888
    9.0.0
  • Port Microsoft.Extensions documentation from .NET 8.0 APIs #88562
    9.0.0
  • In .NET 9 preview 5 blazor WASM with chromium browsers, when using request streaming, `HttpRequestException` is thrown unexpectedly if a response is sent before the stream is fully sent to the server #104612
    9.0.0
  • Vector256 assert is firing for crossgen'd SPCL #90265
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'numArgs == 2' during 'Linear scan register alloc' with `Avx512F.VL.Fixup` and `Avx512F.VL.Shuffle2x128` #105970
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'childNode->canBeContained()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' with `Avx512F.FixupScalar` #105968
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'varDsc->GetRegNum() == REG_STK' during 'Generate code' with `Avx512F.Fixup` #105967
    9.0.0
  • Announcement: PR Merge on Green will be enforced from 3/19/2024 #99643
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 ReadyToRun regression bug: TypeLoadException #96225
    9.0.0
  • Test failures with COMPlus_JitStackChecks=1 #74280
    9.0.0
  • [External] zlib has suppressed warnings #76095
    9.0.0
  • AndroidStripILAfterAOT likely causing "InvalidProgramException: Invalid IL code in ..." #104156
    9.0.0
  • Follow up items for Options validation source generator #87844
    9.0.0
  • Crash when disposing an EventListener during shutdown #103480
    9.0.0
  • Deserializing DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthNames from a JSON configuration file causes "ArgumentException: Length of the array must be 13" despite correct input #90022
    9.0.0
  • Regression: ZipFile/ZipArchive entry name decoding not working correctly when entryNameEncoding is specified #92283
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Potential bad codegen for `AVX512F.BlendVariable`/`AVX512F.BlendVariable` #105822
    9.0.0
  • Net8 - Vector2.Normalize and old(?) CPU - wrong result #99391
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator emits SYSLIB1100 when it shouldn't apply #93132
    9.0.0
  • Environment variable DOTNET_DbgEnableMiniDump=1 doens't work when unhandled exception occurs in worker thread #103000
    9.0.0
  • ILLink: Trim analyzer doesn't warn on reflection access to annotated members when the source of the `Type` is GetType on a DAM-annotated class #102002
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_DeleteCategory #94395
    9.0.0
  • Using EnableConfigurationBindingGenerator and Uri property wrong binding when null #98943
    9.0.0
  • Configuration binding generator produces incorrect type #95561
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'm_stacks != nullptr' during 'SSA: insert phis' #105667
    9.0.0
  • SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue fails on distros without quic #82077
    8.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' during 'Generate code' #105723
    9.0.0
  • [IILink] UnsafeAccessor work for CorLib #106009
  • Arm64/Sve: Sve_Multiply tests failing #105736
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluate methods with short arguments #93057
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix class returned on evaluation of expression with "?" #69543
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Show correct datatypes for int, long, double #93971
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Todo in expression evaluation #65864
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Support complex expressions with null-condition #69640
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-mathematical expression #76015
    Future
  • [wasm[debugger] Support `DebuggerTypeProxyAttribute(string)` #77315
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by `object` schema #77536
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Expand support of `DebuggerTypeProxy` #77768
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerRootHidden` elements cannot have identical names #77965
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Invoke static getter in valuetype not working #80049
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] RootHidden is not working correctly in DebuggerTypeProxy #76876
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix behavior about setting breakpoints on hidden lines #73867
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Detect when overriding field is overridden on `GetProperties` #73298
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exception reason on evaluation of method that throws #69300
    Future
  • System.IO.IOException: ' Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream.' #98654
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 16 Regressions on 12/12/2023 7:40:56 AM #96193
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Roslyn/CscBench/CscBench.cmd #98596
    9.0.0
  • How to post-processing binaries before bundling when use Publish AOT? #106003
  • [iOS] App crashes with native out of memory error due to memory leak of elements inside a Grid. #104272
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.CancelTest / ReceiveAsync_Cancel_Success (server: ws://corefx-net.cloudapp.net/WebSocket/EchoWebSocket.ashx) #19217
    Future
  • Compiling .NET 8 into native AOT was detected as a trojan virus by antivirus software. #105959
  • Avoid building `StringBuilder` in `DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler` #105775
  • Appending formatted `StringBuilder` into itself requires documenting on reference #105957
  • HttpClient(AndroidMessageHandler) with NTLM v2 auth and Self Signed Certificate returns 401 Unauthorized #102107
  • ConcurrentDictionary.TryGetValue crashes with System.IndexOutOfRangeException: Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException #102545
  • Null ThreadHandle in .NET 8 #103129
  • [API Proposal]: Add helper to be able to use options while registering services #105914
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Remove --user from pip installs #106055
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix input size flag on `vpermd`. #106054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TimeOnlyConverter should tolerate more formats in line with TimeSpanConverter #106053
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #106052
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring back assert in fx_ver_t::parse #106050
    area-Host
  • Backport https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/100528 to release/8.0 to fix Perf runs. #106049
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 Helix Images to pipeline #106048
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Use `jitstd::utility::scoped_code` to unmark trees during lowering #106046
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106045
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #106044
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make sure get_total_soh_stable_size never return zero #106043
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [EventPipe] Block EventPipeProvider Deletion for ongoing callbacks #106040
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fix compilation of NativeAOT with Xcode 16 #106039
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure we consistently broadcast the result of simd dot product #106031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix long branches in jiterpreter #106030
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Mark AOT modules unusable if no AOT version is found #106026
    os-android, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0] Bump additional npm deps and lock file format #106019
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] HijackFrame::UpdateRegDisplay update A0 #106018
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure owning type of GVMs is kept #106016
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • EventSource startup initialization #106014
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • [Mono AOT] Fix error when returning zero sized struct #106013
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix typo in comment of SAVE_ARGUMENT_REGISTERS #106011
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Move RequiresAlign8 flag from RareFlags into ExtendedFlags #106010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix infinite loop in foregroundgc test #106006
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add memory barriers to native AOT asm helpers #106004
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix TimeZone Names #106038
    area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Don't hit all properties on Color in ColorTranslator #106042
    area-System.Drawing
  • Fix _LOGALLOC define #106023
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement basic (recommended against) support for inheriting from COM interfaces defined in different assemblies #105119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [browser] http streaming request server error #105709
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update branding to 8.0.9 #106035
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.34 #106034
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Lower expected object count in gcheapenumerationprofiler test #106008
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure we aren't containing nodes that shouldn't be contained #105993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Add release/9.0 to the trigger includes for perf and perf_slow. #106032
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetObjectData getting COM RCW/CCW #105846
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix problem in ReadyToRun_TypeGenericInfoMap::HasConstraints (Recovery PR) #105835
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • Fix JitStackChecks failures #105711
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [EventPipe] Handle EventPipe Enable calls during shutdown #105842
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Respect general-purpose bit flags when decoding ZipArchiveEntry names and comments #103271
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change
  • Ensure we consistently broadcast the result of simd dot product #105888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure embedded masking is handled for emitIns_R_R #105972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix dump generation on background threads #105898
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix SVE API formatting for FFR APIs #106017
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make ReflectionAccessAnalyzer logic more similar to ILLink/ILC #105956
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Extend USEASG liveness to cover partial writes to retbufs #105996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Merge `.managedcode` and `hydrated` sections into well-known sections #106012
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Generate FMA uses in the correct order #105723 #105885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Emit predicated version of the MUL instruction for Sve.Multiply() #105948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update IncrementingPollingCounter only on Timer thread #105548
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Enable ReceiveAsync_Cancel_Success test #105995
    area-System.Net
  • Delete some useless RareFlags #105945
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix comments around static constructor memory #105911
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [debugger] Adding comment #105999
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Fix Reg Order for Float Registers #105930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable W^X in Rosetta emulated x64 containers on macOS #105117
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • Set the initial spin count unit to 10 for DATAS. #105634
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix copy constructor injection for unsafe value classes #105961
    Servicing-consider, arch-x86, os-windows, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix resolving types with primary constructors using in parameters #105928
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Add WebSocket Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout (minimal) implementation #105841
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2509956 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Try Fix Cpu Usage Test #105891
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Fix a nested-externs warning in mono #104817
    area-Tracing-mono, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • ILLink: Keep parameter names unless DebuggerSupport is disabled #105714
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [LoongArch64] Fix code generation for type conversion from float/double to uint/ulong. #105783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Arm64/Sve: DelayfreeUses for FMLA should take into account CndSel for RMW #105541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Refactor memory copies in `SafeBuffer` #105206
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Use correct IL offset when reporting dataflow warnings for return statements #105661
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • RunWithFakeThreshold with DisableParallelization #103423
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add support for doubly nested intrinsic classes #105761
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add/update AssemblyBuilder/PersistedAssemblyBuilder tests covering boundary / edge case scenarios #105782
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Consider methods returning constants same as substitutions #105878
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Creating new TypeName without reparsing + usage in NRBF #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*FirstFaulting APIs #104964
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Fix flaky tests in WindowsServiceLifetimeTests #105666
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • ILLink analyzer: add warnings for DAM on type #105994
    area-Meta
  • [WASI] timers based on wasi:clocks #105879
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Avoid containing non-embedded conditional select #105719 #105812
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix conditional select for Zeroing predicates #102904 #105737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Split trees containing no-return calls to avoid creating illegal IR #105942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #105776

  • [mono] Heap snapshot system for WASM #105713
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono

  • MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #105853
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question] RhpGcPoll implementation. #2644

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to August 6 #2647

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Port (most of) compiler-generated helpers to WASM #2645

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workload errors with nightly SDK #42563
  • Stop inferring the `PlatformTarget` in the SDK when targeting modern .NET applications #42558
    10.0.1xx
  • Expose public APIs for end-to-end SDK tests #42557
  • Flag usage of non-AnyCPU values for PlatformTarget in modern .NET applications #42556
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk references deprecated package Microsoft.NETCore.Targets #42544
  • Implement Template Options Filtering #42541
  • Skip CanInstantiateTemplate_WithAlias Test Due to Unimplemented Alias Feature #42539
  • How to post-processing binaries before bundling when use Publish AOT? #42537
  • dotnet-watch fix handling deleted files #42535

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E]With Net9 preview 7 zip installed, maui workload update failed: Version 9.0.0-preview.7.24405.1 of package microsoft.maui.core is not found... #42525

PullRequests

Created

  • Only publish artifacts on success #42574
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] use stage 2 MSBuild version instead of stage 0 for msbuild disjoint c… #42571
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2509905 #42570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42567
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix feature band when assigning a workload to a workload install type #42566
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #42564
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid downloading of Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset when building in dogfood environment #42552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Wasm] Moves wasm reload logic out of ASP.NET Core and into the SDK #42549
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • ResolvePackageReferences: PackageDependenciesDesignTime inherits transitive package DiagnosticLevel #42546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix bug in workload history recorder #42536
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • use stage 2 MSBuild version instead of stage 0 for msbuild disjoint c… #42551
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update branding to 6.0.426 #42554
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Skip Attribute to Issue Link #42507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.305 #42561
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.401 #42562
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.109 #42555
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.134 #42553
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add BeforeMicrosoftNETSdkTargets #40344
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Drop FirstTimeMessageAspNetCertificateLinux #42519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Exclude Directory.Build.rsp from .gitignore template #42401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, needs team triage, 10.0.1xx
  • Enable specifying install search location options for published `apphost` #42455
    Area-Infrastructure, area-Host, untriaged
  • Support launchSettings.json workingDirectory with dotnet run #42534
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • namespace internal access modifier #2497
  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
    Working Set
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113

    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: better conversion from element #8338

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Codegen for spreading a null array does not throw NullReferenceException #74668
  • Missing nullability warning for spreads of maybe-null collections #74667
  • Add ErrorCode to RuntimeRudeEdit #74666
  • Add ProjectInfo.WithId #74665
  • Copy&paste into raw string literal affects formatting #74661
  • Is there a way to modify the file properties of the exe generated after .NET compilation? #74655

Closed

  • Roslyn codegen impacting array variance exception behavior #73215
    17.12

PullRequests

Created

  • Update field keyword feature name and details #74671
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractSymbolCompletionProvider.CreateItems #74670
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove test dependency from BuildValidator #74669
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add ProjectInfo.WithId public API #74664
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Unify on-the-fly docs settings with C++ #74663
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Defensive null collection checks #74662
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Examples of use-auto-prop suggesting to use 'field' #74659
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Update 'use auto property' to support using the `field` keyword #74629
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Unsubscribe from UIContext events when the LSP server exits #74656
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Exclude BuildValidator from VMR when building without tests #74660
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations again in BlockStructure collection #74627
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • CodeQL fixes #74658
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid optimizing away ref array access #74553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in SymbolKey.ResolveString #74618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use manual `foreach` instead of `AddRange` method for certain collection expression spreads #74630
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NavigationManager.NavigateToLogout() stuck on authentication/logout-callback - reopen. #57202
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #57200
  • Paginator renders extra empty rows when page isn't full of items #57199
  • Empty form body with optional form file-based argument produces unexpected 408 in minimal APIs #57195
  • RoutePattern.RawText does not reflect the leading slash in Route attribute #57194
  • [Blazor] Better way to configure some of the "internal" blazor endpoints #57193
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Wrong http status code if CreatedResult in Put methods #57189
  • Cannot publish project to Azure App Service because it defaults to Linux but I use Windows containers #57184

Closed

  • DictionaryModelBinder not working with null default value in .Net 7 #56710
  • Docker build targets included with default Visual Studio templates don't work because HTTPS is half set up #57181
  • [Blazor] DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints unexpected exception #56176
    9.0-rc1
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #57187
  • HybridCache - rename RemoveKeyAsync and RemoveTagAsync to "By" #55332
    9.0-preview5
  • [Blazor] Serving .gz Compressed Sitemap Files with app.MapStaticAssets() #57161
  • Blazor 8 Cannot Handle a Root Path Variable #57192
  • _blazor/initializer 404 (not found) #57176
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk references deprecated package Microsoft.NETCore.Targets #57188
  • NavLink blazor component does not add CSS isolation attribute to anchor #57160
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24379.15] Fail to launch SPOTClient app after retargeting it to .NET 9.0 with error: Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: Could not find 'PlatformHelpers.initSearchInputFocus' #57138
    9.0-rc1
  • At reflow resolution "Hamburger" control is not visible clearly: A11y_ASP.NET_BlazorWebAssemblyStandalone_Home_Reflow #56295
    9.0-rc1
  • @microsoft/signalr 8.0.7 In React Native App. Failed to start the connection: Error: WebSocket failed to connect. The connection could not be found on the server, either the endpoint may not be a SignalR endpoint, the connection ID is not present on the server, or there is a proxy blocking WebSockets #57183
  • [Blazor] negotiateVersion (SignalR) best practice in regards to XSS #57091
    9.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to Microsoft.OpenApi 1.6.17 #57201
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, area-minimal
  • Update branding to 8.0.9 #57198
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.34 #57197
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Set requiredness for primitive and files in forms #57196
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Revert "Prefer keys old enough to have propagated (#54309)" #57186
    area-dataprotection
  • [8.0] Optionally respect HTTP/1.0 keep-Alive for HTTP.sys #57182
    area-networking, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Sharing PathNormalizer Implementations #57178
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Resolve potential XSS concerns from scanners in SignalR #57180
    area-signalr, 9.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Apply `color-scheme` to error UI #57173
    area-mvc, area-blazor, 9.0-rc1
  • [Blazor][Accessibility] At reflow resolution "Hamburger" control is not visible clearly #57127
    area-mvc, 9.0-rc1
  • [MVC] Preserve type attribute when defined in Script tag helper #57170
    area-mvc, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Use Ascii.ToUtf16 in StringUtilities #56578
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Allow `<FocusOnNavigate>` to work when rendered statically #57131
    area-blazor
  • Add client span to SignalR .NET client #57101
    area-signalr
  • Use [DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptions] #57148
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore to 6.6.2 #56266
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0.9
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allow ShowColumnOptionsAsync method to accept null parameter #56991
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use BaseTypeInfo API to fix up polymorphic schemas #56908
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Closed

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Configuration of Entities using inheritance that add incoming relationships to a base entity without any real discriminator #34368
  • Projections on JSON columns containing array are not working #34367
  • Possible memory leak in relation to (larger) strings #34365

Closed

  • SqlQuery throws 'non-composable SQL' for update statements that returns a scalar value #34366
  • Query performance issue: how to found the reason? and which toools to use? #34369
  • Cosmos: Switch the default discriminator property to $type #34269
    9.0.0
  • ComplexProperty column naming prefixes etc #34359
  • Introduce UseAzureSql/UseAzureSynapse as alternatives to UseSqlServer #33816
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: incorrect result when projecting out-of-bounds element of an owned collection #34351

PullRequests

Created

  • Basic FSharp test project and a single test. #34372

Merged

  • Introduce UseAzureSynapse and UseAzureSql #34052
  • [release/8.0] Use placeholder value to fix CredScan #34342
    tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Update Helix pools #34234
    tell-mode
  • [release/8.0] Update Helix pools #34232
    tell-mode
  • Update branding to 8.0.9 #34371
  • Update branding to 6.0.34 #34370
  • Promote Json tests to Core so that they can be utilized for Cosmos. #34355
  • Change default embedded discriminator property from "Discriminator" to "$type" #34340

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #34144
  • New EF.Constant handling #34297
  • Support vector search on Cosmos DB #33991
